name: Nid
description:
This is the story of a lost little girl and a deep, dark cave. Search for your friends and explore a haunting path through the underground in this audio focused unity game, created as part of an assignment at Box Hill University.

Nicholas Kumashov - Composer/Director/Visuals

Karl Fee - Sound Design

Freya Dahlstrom - Visuals

Jeremy Bratetich - Scripting
